reviews.review_text: I read the reviews before buying it. Well I got very mixed reviews. A lot of the reviews stated that it didn't work on the switch only the ps4. Well my son use it on both his ps4 and switch. For the price it's not a bad purchase. I'm buying one for my stepson too.

reviews.title: Great for the price
reviews.review_text: Bought these for my 8 year old. He says they work great. Compared to other gaming headphones I looked at, these were reasonably priced and worked great. Have only used for about a week so hopefully they last a while. They fit his head perfectly and were not too big.

reviews.title: Good but wears out quickly
reviews.review_text: An excellent product for it's price, with reliability issues. I've bought two of these headsets in the past 9 months with the latest one having a complete audio output failure in under 2 weeks.

reviews.title: Decent Headset, Disappointing Microphone
reviews.review_text: The headset's overall quality is decent, but the microphone performance is poor. It often misclassifies your voice as background noise, no matter how loudly you speak, making it ineffective. While the noise-canceling feature isn't exceptional, it's passable.

reviews.title: Unbelievably Good Quality for this Price.
reviews.review_text: i bought these headphones on a whim to have some backup headphones for my computer, I mean, ofr this price, hiw could I turn it down? I was SHOCKED at how good of quality these were. I handed them to my younger (adult) brother who is, like me, pretty technically savvy and appreciative of good pairs of headphones. We already have a range of high-quality headphones from Sennheiser, Sony and Skullcandy (their Bluetooth Crushers are amazing for bassheads btw). Anyway, I had him try these headphones on and check out the quality and tell me what he thinks I paid for them. He guessed $120! I personally think that's high, but these are seriously worth at least $50, and if someone had done the same thing with me, I probably would have guessed the retail cost being around $70-80. I just HAD to buy a second pair right away! The cushions are good quality and comfortable, the plastic does NOT feel cheap or fragile, and the headset is very decently sized! My brother and I both have large heads and these fit very comfortably. The headband has metal reinforcement and is very well cushioned. The mic cable is metal and although very easily manipulable, holds its position solidly without fail. The long cable for the connections is hugh quality cloth and all of the connections are very well done so I don't see them getting damaged anytime soon. Even eith all this quality, the headset is still very light and soft on your ears. its clear it was thoughtfully designed for gaming for extended periods. They come with a USB connection, but this seems to only power the LEDs on the headset. The 3.5mm connector the headset has built in is for a mic/headphone combo jack which would work great on a compatible phone or Xbox/Playstation controller, but in case youre using these with a desktop computer that has the mic and headphone jack separated, they come with an adapter for that too. If the manufacturer can make this wired headset for so cheap that it retaisl for $10, they should seriously consider making a Bluetooth version and retailing jt for $15-$20. It would knock out any and all competition in that category at that price point. If you don't mind wired headphones, BUY THESE! You wont regret it!

reviews.title: The best ever
reviews.review_text: I will say that this is the best headphones I ever tried and to turtle beaches or like not gonna beat this like I‚Äôm so my old these ones are the best it feels very comfy on your head and the audio is very crispy won‚Äôt hear any background noises and the mic is totally amazing here you crystal clear and like I‚Äôm telling you it‚Äôs like glad if like I wear glasses and it is like amazing for glasses like I support glasses and everything like that and I‚Äôm telling you i t‚Äôs very very very comfy you won‚Äôt hear any background noise and I totally recommend this over to the beaches

reviews.title: Adapter required but not included
reviews.review_text: I didn't get to use this headset so I can't speak to the quality of them. I can however say that I was unaware they required an adapter to be used with the Xbox one. The adapter is sold separately and costs more than the headset itself. Make sure you read all the specs before purchasing!!

reviews.title: For the price, it's a good headset.
reviews.review_text: I ordered this for my grandson to replace a broken headset from a different company to use with his Xbox. He likes this headset's audio a lot more, but the voice quality through the mic is not the best. Other people can hear him, but they have said it crackles at times and he sounds tinny. If you're looking for a cheap headset, especially for a kid that you know is not always going to be careful with it, you can't go wrong buying this one.

reviews.title: Refund not processed
reviews.review_text: I purchased 4 headsets by accident. Returned 2 in the original shipping box. Seller only refunded me for one headset, says he cant refund me for the other and I need to contact Walmart for my refund. Walmart tells me its still in transit. How, if you received one, you received both. Never again!

reviews.title: Perfect for music.
reviews.review_text: It's got good sound quality, and I can definitely feel the bass from my music as I like it to be. Even though the USB cord for the LED light on it might be short, it's the only inconvenience that it has. However, that doesn't affect it's purpose. It's definitely worth the purchase.

reviews.title: got these for my son and he loves them!
reviews.review_text: per my son's description: I've had this headset for at least 2 years and it still works well. The headset is light, super comfortable, and very durable. One ear pad falls off but still can sit comfortably none the less. Good for switching between pc, Xbox 1, and ps4 ( possibly ps5 haven't tested). The headset works great for gaming and rarely has echo or background noise. If you're on a tight budget this is a great headset to get and I would definitely reccomend it.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review_text: So overall the headset is very nice. We wear glasses so finding a headset that doesn't hurt is difficult. These aren't bad. The mic is on the left which is different and in order to use the LED light the headset has to be plugged directly into the console, otherwise they do not work which kinda sucks. No where in the packaging does it tell you that either. It did come with the adapter needed for older consoles with is nice. Arrived on time, if not a bit early.
